ctx: Panamski volivci na referendumu o obnovi prekopa
content:
Več kot 5 ljudi?

As many as 27,500 workers are estimated to have died during
construction of the canal.
author: anon-11733

content: Hvala za opozorjeno napako, on-lin škrat je pojedel besedo "tisoč".
